text: Stephen Joseph Flemmi (born June 9, 1934) is an Italian-American gangster. He was part of the Winter Hill Gang and worked with mob boss Whitey Bulger. Beginning in 1975, Flemmi was a top informant for the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI). ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American gangsters Category:People from Boston
title: Stephen Flemmi
